sections.description:
A powerful WordPress plugin that helps developers and designers create visually stunning, high-performance websites with ease right inside the Gutenberg editor.

Available Blocks:
 GSAP Hero Block - Create animated hero sections with smooth GSAP animations
 Portfolio Block - Showcase your work with elegant portfolio layouts
 Services Block - Display your services with professional card layouts
 Process Block - Illustrate your workflow with step-by-step process blocks
 Project Block - Highlight your projects with interactive project showcases
 Questions Block - Create FAQ sections with expandable content
 Scroll Controlled Blocks - Advanced scroll-triggered animations
 Scroll Triggered Blocks - Smooth scroll-based animations
 Button Block - Customizable button components
 Particles Block - Add dynamic particle effects to your pages
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/adaire-blocks directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Adaire Blocks > Enable/Disable blocks > Make use of the blocks in the Gutenberg Editor
